current.text: Not even drinking milk for one month would get us like that.

text: I'm so hungry! I haven't late eaten all day!
Take your mind off it. Look, Crys. This magazine is on China's top ten beauties!
They're all so thin! Her cheekbones are great.
She doesn't have an ounce of fat on her face.
Umm the mag says she's one sixty five centimeters tall and thirty eight kilos. If only we could be that thin then...
